html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02552017-03-24,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedule lll to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Methylphenidate)
PrecisOrder Amending SCHEDULE III TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (METHYLPHENIDATE) in order to (1) protect the health and safety of Canadians and to mitigate the risk of misuse of New psychoactive substances derived from methylphenidate, while allowing access for legitimate therapeutic, scientific and research purposes; and (2) enable Health Canada and law enforcement agencies to administer and enforce provisions of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act and its regulations with respect to these substances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0044 Publication Date: 2017-04-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending Schedule lll to the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act (Methylphenidate)
precis: Order Amending SCHEDULE III TO THE CONTROLLED DRUGS AND SUBSTANCES ACT (METHYLPHENIDATE) in order to (1) protect the health and safety of Canadians and to mitigate the risk of misuse of New psychoactive substances derived from methylphenidate, while allowing access for legitimate therapeutic, scientific and research purposes; and (2) enable Health Canada and law enforcement agencies to administer and enforce provisions of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act and its regulations with respect to these substances.
